resources.string: Kaleidoscope is the App which enables you feel the liveliness. Kaleidoscope is used to share live experience with your friends and family. Kaleidoscope refreshes the mood of the user by making it interactive with the users. As per the user point of view it is a complete version of satisfaction as well as for interactivity between two.
Abhishek Kumar Shukla He is Post Graduate in Computer applications. made this project at the time of training in Trainedge Consulting Pvt. Ltd.
